TopicTitle: One little thing for .91 (or whatever the next version)

Articles.Content: One thing I'd like to see in KSP is more variety of music. Kevin MacLeod makes some great stuff but I feel KSP needs more music, it really sets the emotion for the game. Kevin has a lot of other good works that would fit KSP. Music is often over looked in some games, Kevin makes good music.
I agree. Kevin makes the best music. I'm listening to it now!
I've personally found several I could EASILY HEAR in KSP as it REAKS of it...
